00077 #define Ctrl_access_lock()    ctrl_access_lock()
00078 
00081 #define Ctrl_access_unlock()  xSemaphoreGive(ctrl_access_semphr)

00084 
00086 static xSemaphoreHandle ctrl_access_semphr = NULL;

00162 static const struct
00163 {
00164   Ctrl_status (*test_unit_ready)(void);
00165   Ctrl_status (*read_capacity)(U32 *);
00166   Bool (*wr_protect)(void);
00167   Bool (*removal)(void);
00168 #if ACCESS_USB == ENABLED
00169   Ctrl_status (*usb_read_10)(U32, U16);
00170   Ctrl_status (*usb_write_10)(U32, U16);
00171 #endif
00172 #if ACCESS_MEM_TO_RAM == ENABLED
00173   Ctrl_status (*mem_2_ram)(U32, void *);
00174   Ctrl_status (*ram_2_mem)(U32, const void *);
00175 #endif
00176   const char *name;
00177 } lun_desc[MAX_LUN] =
00178 {
00179 #if LUN_0 == ENABLE
00180   Lun_desc_entry(0),
00181 #endif
00182 #if LUN_1 == ENABLE
00183   Lun_desc_entry(1),
00184 #endif
00185 #if LUN_2 == ENABLE
00186   Lun_desc_entry(2),
00187 #endif
00188 #if LUN_3 == ENABLE
00189   Lun_desc_entry(3),
00190 #endif
00191 #if LUN_4 == ENABLE
00192   Lun_desc_entry(4),
00193 #endif
00194 #if LUN_5 == ENABLE
00195   Lun_desc_entry(5),

00198   Lun_desc_entry(6),
00199 #endif
00200 #if LUN_7 == ENABLE
00201   Lun_desc_entry(7)
00202 #endif

00216 #ifdef FREERTOS_USED
00217 
00218 Bool ctrl_access_init(void)
00219 {
00220   // If the handle to the protecting semaphore is not valid,
00221   if (!ctrl_access_semphr)
00222   {
00223     // try to create the semaphore.
00224     vSemaphoreCreateBinary(ctrl_access_semphr);
00225 
00226     // If the semaphore could not be created, there is no backup solution.
00227     if (!ctrl_access_semphr) return FALSE;
00228   }
00229 
00230   return TRUE;
00231 }
00232 
00233 
00238 static Bool ctrl_access_lock(void)
00239 {
00240   // If the semaphore could not be created, there is no backup solution.
00241   if (!ctrl_access_semphr) return FALSE;
00242 
00243   // Wait for the semaphore.
00244   while (!xSemaphoreTake(ctrl_access_semphr, -1));
00245 
00246   return TRUE;
00247 }
00248 
00249 #endif  // FREERTOS_USED
00250 
00251 
00252 U8 get_nb_lun(void)
00253 {
00254 #if MEM_USB == ENABLE
00255   U8 nb_lun;
00256 
00257   if (!Ctrl_access_lock()) return MAX_LUN;
00258 
00259   nb_lun = MAX_LUN + host_get_lun();
00260 
00261   Ctrl_access_unlock();
00262 
00263   return nb_lun;
00264 #else
00265   return MAX_LUN;
00266 #endif
00267 }
00268 
00269 
00270 U8 get_cur_lun(void)
00271 {
00272   return LUN_ID_0;
00273 }
00274 
00275 
00276 Ctrl_status mem_test_unit_ready(U8 lun)
00277 {
00278   Ctrl_status status;
00279 
00280   if (!Ctrl_access_lock()) return CTRL_FAIL;
00281 
00282   status = (lun < MAX_LUN) ? lun_desc[lun].test_unit_ready() :
00283 #if LUN_USB == ENABLE
00284                              Lun_usb_test_unit_ready(lun - LUN_ID_USB);
00285 #else
00286                              CTRL_FAIL;
00287 #endif
00288 
00289   Ctrl_access_unlock();
00290 
00291   return status;
00292 }
00293 
00294 
00295 Ctrl_status mem_read_capacity(U8 lun, U32 *u32_nb_sector)
00296 {
00297   Ctrl_status status;
00298 
00299   if (!Ctrl_access_lock()) return CTRL_FAIL;
00300 
00301   status = (lun < MAX_LUN) ? lun_desc[lun].read_capacity(u32_nb_sector) :
00302 #if LUN_USB == ENABLE
00303                              Lun_usb_read_capacity(lun - LUN_ID_USB, u32_nb_sector);
00304 #else
00305                              CTRL_FAIL;
00306 #endif
00307 
00308   Ctrl_access_unlock();
00309 
00310   return status;
00311 }
00312 
00313 
00314 Bool mem_wr_protect(U8 lun)
00315 {
00316   Ctrl_status status;
00317 
00318   if (!Ctrl_access_lock()) return CTRL_FAIL;
00319 
00320   status = (lun < MAX_LUN) ? lun_desc[lun].wr_protect() :
00321 #if LUN_USB == ENABLE
00322                              Lun_usb_wr_protect(lun - LUN_ID_USB);
00323 #else
00324                              CTRL_FAIL;
00325 #endif
00326 
00327   Ctrl_access_unlock();
00328 
00329   return status;
00330 }
00331 
00332 
00333 Bool mem_removal(U8 lun)
00334 {
00335   Ctrl_status status;
00336 
00337   if (!Ctrl_access_lock()) return CTRL_FAIL;
00338 
00339   status = (lun < MAX_LUN) ? lun_desc[lun].removal() :
00340 #if LUN_USB == ENABLE
00341                              Lun_usb_removal();
00342 #else
00343                              CTRL_FAIL;
00344 #endif
00345 
00346   Ctrl_access_unlock();
00347 
00348   return status;
00349 }

00351 
00352 const char *mem_name(U8 lun)
00353 {
00354   return (lun < MAX_LUN) ? lun_desc[lun].name :
00355 #if LUN_USB == ENABLE
00356                            LUN_USB_NAME;
00357 #else
00358                            NULL;
00359 #endif
00360 }

00372 
00373 Ctrl_status memory_2_usb(U8 lun, U32 addr, U16 nb_sector)
00374 {
00375   Ctrl_status status;
00376 
00377   if (!Ctrl_access_lock()) return CTRL_FAIL;
00378 
00379   memory_start_read_action();
00380   status = (lun < MAX_LUN) ? lun_desc[lun].usb_read_10(addr, nb_sector) :
00381                              CTRL_FAIL;
00382   memory_stop_read_action();
00383 
00384   Ctrl_access_unlock();
00385 
00386   return status;
00387 }
00388 
00389 
00390 Ctrl_status usb_2_memory(U8 lun, U32 addr, U16 nb_sector)
00391 {
00392   Ctrl_status status;
00393 
00394   if (!Ctrl_access_lock()) return CTRL_FAIL;
00395 
00396   memory_start_write_action();
00397   status = (lun < MAX_LUN) ? lun_desc[lun].usb_write_10(addr, nb_sector) :
00398                              CTRL_FAIL;
00399   memory_stop_write_action();
00400 
00401   Ctrl_access_unlock();
00402 
00403   return status;
00404 }

00408 
00409 #endif  // ACCESS_USB == ENABLED

00418 
00419 Ctrl_status memory_2_ram(U8 lun, U32 addr, void *ram)
00420 {
00421   Ctrl_status status;
00422 
00423   if (!Ctrl_access_lock()) return CTRL_FAIL;
00424 
00425   memory_start_read_action();
00426   status = (lun < MAX_LUN) ? lun_desc[lun].mem_2_ram(addr, ram) :
00427 #if LUN_USB == ENABLE
00428                              Lun_usb_mem_2_ram(addr, ram);
00429 #else
00430                              CTRL_FAIL;
00431 #endif
00432   memory_stop_read_action();
00433 
00434   Ctrl_access_unlock();
00435 
00436   return status;
00437 }
00438 
00439 
00440 Ctrl_status ram_2_memory(U8 lun, U32 addr, const void *ram)
00441 {
00442   Ctrl_status status;
00443 
00444   if (!Ctrl_access_lock()) return CTRL_FAIL;
00445 
00446   memory_start_write_action();
00447   status = (lun < MAX_LUN) ? lun_desc[lun].ram_2_mem(addr, ram) :
00448 #if LUN_USB == ENABLE
00449                              Lun_usb_ram_2_mem(addr, ram);
00450 #else
00451                              CTRL_FAIL;
00452 #endif
00453   memory_stop_write_action();
00454 
00455   Ctrl_access_unlock();
00456 
00457   return status;
00458 }

00473   #if ACCESS_MEM_TO_MEM == ENABLED
00474 
00475 #include "fat.h"
00476 
00477 Ctrl_status stream_mem_to_mem(U8 src_lun, U32 src_addr, U8 dest_lun, U32 dest_addr, U16 nb_sector)
00478 {
00479   static U8 sector_buf[FS_SIZE_OF_SECTOR];
00480   Ctrl_status status = CTRL_GOOD;
00481 
00482   while (nb_sector--)
00483   {
00484     if ((status = memory_2_ram(src_lun, src_addr++, sector_buf)) != CTRL_GOOD) break;
00485     if ((status = ram_2_memory(dest_lun, dest_addr++, sector_buf)) != CTRL_GOOD) break;
00486   }
00487 
00488   return status;
00489 }
00490 
00491   #endif  // ACCESS_MEM_TO_MEM == ENABLED
00492 
00493 
00494 Ctrl_status stream_state(U8 id)
00495 {
00496   return CTRL_GOOD;
00497 }
00498 
00499 
00500 U16 stream_stop(U8 id)
00501 {
00502   return 0;
00503 }
